name: (damnātio) memoriae
description:
Warning: Playing this game does involve some minor flashing when interacting with links! Please exercise proper caution.

damnātio memoriae is an interactive Mahoyaku fanfiction about the character Faust Lavinia, which can be 'played' by interacting with links (displayed in orange text), as well as the glowing objects within images.

Click on the objects to access the stories related to them—you can read up to 25 small stories this way! If at any point you want to go back or return to a previous story, press the back button in the left margin or use the provided orange links.

This story was completed as part of the Mahoyaku Flowerworks 2022 fanproject; please check out the rest of the entries here!
